questionTitle: The new factory must be finished ________ as the profitability of the company depends on it.
The colour of the handle does not ________ so long as it is the right size.
We went to the railway station to ________ our friends ________.
He shouldn't be allowed to play in the club. He's not a ________.
After a day of housework I am totally ________.
There is no reason to ________ his honesty; he is absolutely sincere.
The constant ________ on their hands causes injury.
The League of Nations was set ________ after the First World War.
All good things must come to ________ end.
The evening performance had to be cancelled ________ of the illness of the leading actress.
Buses and trains are the most important forms of public ________ in this country.
You should have told me you were married, ________?
The books I borrowed are overdue. I'll have to take them back to the ________.
The actor enjoys giving ________ of poems by his favourite poets.
The phone is ringing. Could you ________, please?
The pilot said that with one engine of the plane out of action, it had been ________ over the Channel.
All the travel arrangements ________ before we received a letter from him.
The last meeting of our section ________ on 15th September.
You are still working on your essay. I think you ________ it by six o'clock.
sharp practices = ________.
anwers: reality as it really is, not embellished to look better
